channel.title: Maven on robonovotny
channel.description: Recent content in Maven on robonovotny

item.title: Mounting the Camel: A stdin-stdout example
item.description: Setting up Camel via Maven Create a new project Within shell, move to your Eclipse workspace and create a new project. mvn archetype:generate In the interactive mode, use the default archetype (press Enter) with latest version (press Enter), fill in the group ID (sk.upjs.ics.novotnyr), artifact ID (camel-xmpp-example) and use the default values for version and package. A directory camel-xmpp-exampleÂ·is created with a conventional subdirectory structure and a pom.xml. Upgrade to JDK6 Camel is built upon JDK6.
